name: Dragon Breeder
description:
Get items from your backpack to fulfill the needs of the baby-dragon.

The resources of your invested items have to match at least the baby's needs, then every investment will be gone.

You can only hold up to three items at the same time.

Dev's note

The Jam Version is my official submission for Ludum Dare 46 Jam.

Its theme was: Keep it alive

Known bugs of jam-version:
  • Typos in 'How to play' text
Post-Jam Change Log Version 1.1
  • Fix typos in 'How to play' text
  • Add level progress indicators
  • Adjust level-difficulties to be reasonable balanced
